snippet: Last week, the ATP announced a 14 percent annual increase in prize money over the next four years at its Masters 1000 tournaments. On Wednesday, the International Tennis Federation proposed increases for its Pro Circuit, the lowest level of...
abstract: International Tennis Federation proposes prize-money increases on all levels of its ITF Pro Circuit; if federation board approves proposal increases will take effect in 2016.
lead_paragraph: Last week, the ATP announced a 14 percent annual increase in prize money over the next four years at its Masters 1000 tournaments. On Wednesday, the International Tennis Federation proposed increases for its Pro Circuit, the lowest level of professional tennis.

headline.main: More Prize Money for Tennis Stars, and Maybe for Rising Ones
headline.print_headline: More Money for Stars, and Maybe for Rising Ones
